name: Rhucarbarian... The Bootleg
description:
Note: This game requires the WebGL 2.0 graphics API, which is currently unsupported by Safari and Internet Explorer.

Please use Chrome or Firefox!

The aim of the game you may ask?? DESTROY EVERYTHING!! 

Controls:

W,A,S,D - for movement / Mouse 1 -  shoot / C - change camera view

Team:

Raees, Tyler, Jay, Jacob, Danny, Luke, Max, Harvey, Jamie

Game Created By:

Raees, Tyler, Jay, Jacob, Danny, Luke,
